sn27.10:1.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpasmiṃ chandarāgo, cittasseso upakkileso …pe… yo viññāṇasmiṃ chandarāgo, cittasseso upakkileso.
sn27.10:1.3: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu cetaso upakkileso pahīno hoti, nekkhammaninnañcassa cittaṃ hoti.
sn27.10:1.4: Nekkhammaparibhāvitaṃ cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ khāyati, abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyesu dhammesū”ti.
